ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Submitted for Approval"), (OR ( ISNULL( eBusiness_Solution__c ), ISNULL( PO_Routing__c ), ISNULL ( Scope_of_Project_IT__c ), ISNULL( VOS_System__c ))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To change Status to Submitted for Approval, all of the following fields must be updated. - eBusiness Solution - PO Routing - Scope of Project - VOS System
